name: Eric Rauscher
text: Not the advertised price, it's a dollar more.  The pizza is never hot and ready I always have to wait for them to cook one.  You can see the Ready rack in the photo is completely empty, it was 6 pm.

name: Cara Metz
text: Perfect order and delicious pizza and crazy bread again! Consistency and super friendly staff are my fave part of this place. Took me 3 mins to order pay get my food and dip!üòÅ

name: Jacob Ensign
text: Little Caesars is an affordable pizza place.  The food is good for the price.  I've ordered pizzas from this location multiple times.  The reason why I give it five stars is because the employees who work there do a good job.  Consistent quality and service.

name: KENDRA HARRIS
text: The older lady that took our order was very nice but the manager named Justin was very rude to her and wouldn't help with customers just yelling at her that she had customers up front while she was working in the back on food. He was trying ‚Ä¶More

name: Brooklyn Meeker
text: There is sometimes a wait because they are a very popular location, but the staff is AMAZING and if you call in your order ahead of time your order will be ready when you get there which saves time. Very hard working staff and they are super kind.

name: TJ Martinez
text: Ordered a custom large pizza this evening.  Pepperoni, w' extra sauce for carry out.   Ready in 10 minutes...  friendly service.    Tasty !

name: Tyler Burch
text: very nice employees but they close at 10 not 11 please don‚Äôt come after 10 because they will be closed. Bless these employees for their patience

name: Johan Liebert
text: I drove to two different little ceasars and both were closed. How about updating your hours so you dont waste my time

name: Brett Barney
text: I don‚Äôt go to little Caesars for a gourmet experience. I go to get a pizza and get out. At this location you can stand at the counter for five minutes while some teenager stares at you and shifts breadsticks from one shelf to another and ‚Ä¶More

name: zach K
text: This place has been consistently the best Little Caesar‚Äôs in Johnson County from the pizza to the fantastic yummy crazy bread. It‚Äôs been over a decade of dominance in my stomach.

name: Angie Bradshaw
text: Twice in the last two weeks I have tried to order pizza.  Both times I have walked away with nothing because the workers are lazy and rude and don't do their job.  Today they gave away my pizzas to someone else and didn't bother to call and ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Roberson
text: My son like there bread. They raised the price. And always way over cooked. And you ask for fresh ones. They act like you asked for a kidney or there first born child.

name: William Herrington
text: Id leave it at zero stars but it wouldnt let me review it if i did that. Food is always great; but not only did they charge us twice for a single order but when we called half an hour before close to inquire about it they said "were closed" ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle McGrath
text: They need more stores in the Olathe area. The breadsticks were hot but a little overdone with salty butter. Pizza was small but ok when hungry. They should have some pizzas already made to go in a warmer if people come in to get a ready 2 go pizza, which they had none made the time I went in.

name: D Law
text: The wait time gets a little long but pizza is good.

name: Randy DeSha
text: Terrible, didn't have a five meat ready and they left off the ham when they made me one so they had to make it again. Was there almost 30 mins getting what should of been hot and ready.

name: Christopher Edenfield
text: Stopped in to Get a Hot& Ready Pepperoni.. None were ready so we had to wait a few minutes.  Pizza was ok, could have used some more cheese and sauce but it was a good snack..

name: Shawn B
text: Go in right when they open, usually. Pizza is always perfect.  The person behind the counter is always nice. I wish I could have a Bigfoot*tm pizza though. Om nom nom.

name: Jeff Matson
text: Overcharged for hot & ready pizzas.  I had my two nephews with me so he figured I wouldn't say anything.  Guy behind the counter (owner?) knew he did it.  Gave me my change, but wadded up the receipt & threw it in the trash so I couldn't see what I was charged.  It the simple things that keep customers from coming back.

name: Victoria McGowan
text: Bread sticks are always ready!  Staff is pretty awesome.  My friends son works there so i support any chain that support youth!

name: McKenzie Zuchowski
text: Decent pizza for the price, if you're looking for a fast and cheap meal I would recommend it.

name: Jordan Mask
text: Make sure you have them check your pizza before you take it! They are supposed to and frequently mix up the hot and ready pizzas, leave them uncut etc. I got cheese instead of pepperoni and when I returned to switch it out I had to wait 10 minutes and they threw the cheese in the trash instead of letting me keep it. Wasteful!

name: Aaron Swofford
text: Good price for a pizza. Usually able to pop right in and out without a wait at this location.

name: Christian garcia
text: Sometimes there is a wait and sometimes there isn't. Wait can range from 7 to 20 min at times but fresh pizza is better than a pizza that isnt fresh.

name: Dan Rodriguez
text: Really helped us out with a large order. Great people!

name: Jay C
text: Never know what you'll get from here. Sometimes the pizza is fresh other times you would think you just got your pizza from the Salvation Army on clearance. Disgusting.

name: Tanya M
text: The guy who took my order had dirty fingers, pretty sure he didn't wash his hands before making the pizza, they had no "hot n ready's" , ready because it was a Sunday, had to wait 10 mins for my order, pizza was under cooked. Yuck ü§¢

name: angie s
text: Great place gets busy but u still usely get it hot five stars

name: Jaltaic
text: Sometimes it's ok, but it just took 50 min. to get our food. They had forgotten our order and they gave food to other people that came in long after us. They had no idea what they were doing and were very confused a lot. It was a bad experience.

name: Edwin K. Serem
text: Perfect and very fast. Good job guys

name: Joel Weaver
text: My wife and I got a pizza there this evening and there was a confusion when picking it up and the night manager handled it very unprofessionally. Was rude and snarled at me when she had to, god forbid, give me my refund for the wrong order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Thomas
text: Pizza is hardly ever ready and when it is, it's overcooked. Heck, I had to wait today, the place was dead but when I got home with the pizza I had to wait for, I found it was overdone.

name: David Alexander
text: Good...Fast...Cheep...Like my car...& My Girl... Don't Tell Her Tho. .

name: Scott Shipley
text: The employees all get irritated if you order a classic pepperoni. Take it off the menu if you don‚Äôt want to cook that pizza for your customers. Makes me not want to go there because of how they all act about it.

name: Phyllis Cronbaugh
text: New manager and she is fantastic. I'm a realtor and because I bought 10 pizzas for a company event, she gave them to me at quite a discount. She also is doing specials for kids events. I think the Olathe Little Ceasars is really coming back. Thanks.

name: Terry Steburg
text: Pizza was hot and the assistant manager was very courteous and polite

name: Lizzy bitty
text: Food taste great, at a awesome price value and very fast at preparing the food.

name: Retze Santos
text: Inexpensive pizza and quick.  Friendly staff.

name: David Czernik
text: Better service attitude. Baked fresh for the asking.

name: bestmusic filter
text: Service and employees are not good and hot and ready pizzas are never ready

name: Cody Jacobson
text: I've been to many Little Caesars locations, but this place has got to be one of the lousiest. They are consistently understaffed, so if you want a quick pizza, better call ahead or look somewhere else.

name: Alan Washington
text: The messed up my order but went over and beyond to correct it.

name: Craig Moats
text: Good cheap pizza and its usually ready when you walk in.

name: Nate Walker
text: Always love a pizza thats ready on the fly!

name: Caleb Reed
text: Never actually have anything ready, not even basic cheese and pepperoni pizzas.

name: joe felkins
text: Great people. Gets busy but what you gonna do

name: James D
text: Google says they're open until 11 but employee says Google is wrong and that they close at 10. Google is never wrong, sir

name: Jeff
text: never open been here 3 times a couple hours before close and they were always closed.

name: anonym who
text: Ok service time, cashier is polite

name: Miller Family
text: Decent food. You can't beat the prices, or the fast service!

name: Cruz Lopez
text: Love littlel caesars

name: NICOLE LISLE
text: Just witnessed cashier get screamed at by cook and he was throwing things . I decided to go elsewhere, along with other people.

name: Cory Lafferty
text: I won't stop going, but they seem to mess up every time I call in and the hot and ready pizza don't seem to be ready very often

name: John Miller
text: It was late and hot and ready's where light

name: Matt Kooken
text: They closed an hour early and I drove all the way from DeSoto to this location because it was open it said online and everything and they were in there they just wouldn't serve me. Will not be going back I used to go there often almost everyday for lunch!

name: cindy arndt
text: Friendly staff.  Informative and helpful.

name: David Czernik
text: Cheap food. Wait for order to be made fresh.

name: Jena Fesmire
text: Very unprofessional tonight and inappropriate talk in front of customers. Food is always good but the service this time left a lot to be desired

name: Cody Simonsen
text: Pizza is inconsistent. Some days I'd go and it'd be hot, some days cold.

name: Jim Dice
text: Good and Quick

name: creativewriter101
text: They are no longer open

name: Mike Aguiar
text: No good service and No food ready!

name: Cheri Crosson
text: Good time, good food

name: Biruk Alemu
text: The best pizza

name: Joseph Fowler
text: Temporarily closed sign on the door this week...

name: Jennifer F
text: Closed-Not sure why

name: Ray Carbah
text: Terrible pizza, but cheap.

name: Nana Wireke
text: Love it

name: More ke Gangsta
text: Goodwings

name: ZACHARY DYE
text: wow pizza is good ever i have

name: Jaime Peterson
text: Actually "0"

name: Alejandro Besada
text: Unprofessional bad language took to long to get service and still didn't have my order even when I called an hour ahead

name: Yodie Roth
text: Terrible service

name: paige riewerts
text: Cheap good pizza that hits the spot!

name: kurtis kupiszewski
text: Super bad service, got served the wrong pizza twice in a row. Watched the manager smoke outside then go back in and touch food.

name: Jake Bush
text: Super slow

text: Good cheap and fast
